title: 877 95 "The Parting Time! Pudding's Last Wish!"Transliteration: "Sekibetsu no Toki – Purin Saigo no “Onegai„" (Japanese:惜別の時　プリン最後の“お願い„) Toshinori Fukuzawa Shōji Yonemura March 24, 2019(2019-03-24)
transformers_text: 877 95 The Parting Time Pudding's Last Wish Transliteration Seki be tsu no Toki Pur in Saigo no Onegai Japanese Toshi nori Fuku z awa Sh ji Yone mura March 24 2019 2019 03 24 Sanji finds out about Pedro's death as the Straw Hats successfully sail out of To t to Land and as she overhears the news on Cacao Island Pudding weeps while recalling her memories with Sanji In the Mir ro World Br l e tends to Kata kuri's wounds She reveals that she knows he had laid on his back before and built up his invulnerable image to protect his siblings after she was attacked as a child Jim bei the Sun Pirates and Germ a 66 prepare to retreat from Cacao Island but they are stopped by the arrival of Big Mom Meanwhile Sanji returns to work cooking food for his crew and as he does this his mentor Zef f serves some rowdy pirates at Bara tie
